# deers

> some ASCII ğŸ¦Œs

Yes, the plural form of â€œdeerâ€ is â€œdeerâ€, but â€œdeersâ€ is more fun to say.

The list is just a [text file](deers.txt) and can be used wherever.

![](https://volkan.io/kampus/deer.jpg)

## Examples

```text
  ,_)/
   (-'
 .-'\
  "'\'"""""'),
     )/---,(
    / \  / |      , '     , '   , '   ,'   ,'    ,'   ;     ;


(             )
 `--(_   _)--'
      Y-Y
     /@@ \
    /     \
    `--'.  \             ,
        |   `.__________/)
```

## Install

```
$ npm install deers
```

## Usage

```js
const deers = require('deers');

deers();
```

## API

### deers()

Returns an array of deers.
